abilities.name: soup burst
abilities.description: When the user's health drops below 50%, it shoots soup, harshly lowering its stats and scalding the opponent if contact was made.

abilities.name: technician
abilities.description: Powers up weak moves so the user can deal more damage with them.

abilities.name: punk rock
abilities.description: Boosts the power of sound-based moves. The user also takes half the damage from these kinds of moves.

abilities.name: adaptability
abilities.description: Powers up moves of the same type as the fighter.

abilities.name: skill link
abilities.description: Maximizes the number of times multistrike moves hit.

abilities.name: moxie
abilities.description: Boosts physical attack whenever the user knocks out an opponent.

abilities.name: sturdy
abilities.description: User can't be KOed in one hit.

abilities.name: bulletproof
abilities.description: User is immune to ball/bomb moves.

abilities.name: intimidate
abilities.description: Lowers opponent's attack stat when the user enters.

abilities.name: aerilate
abilities.description: The user's normal type moves become flying type and get a power boost.

abilities.name: normalize
abilities.description: The user's normal type moves get a power boost.

abilities.name: pixilate
abilities.description: The user's normal type moves become fairy type and get a power boost.

abilities.name: refrigerate
abilities.description: The user's normal type moves become ice type and get a power boost.

abilities.name: galvanize
abilities.description: The user's normal type moves become electric type and get a power boost.
